-About Me-

My name is Martinez Baker but friends and family know me better as Manny. I am new to the world of development but I can actually say this is my calling! I am quite ambitious when it comes to solving problems and learning new skills that would take my work to the next level. My dream is to be able create with a team of like minded developers with whom I can begin to build and hone my skill. I look at developing as actually giving a piece of myself to my projects, and in the future I hope to give a piece of my self to every project that my team and I tackle.

-Training-

I received my education and training in the concepts and methodologies of Web Development from Nucamp Web and Mobile Development Bootcamp where I achieved mastery of the their highly intensive curriculum and earned my certification in Full Stack Mobile and Web Development with focuses in HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, React Native, NodeJS and MongoDB.

I received my training and certification for IT Technical Support from Google via their Coursera online training platform, where I completed the five courses that made up the totality of their curriculum, which includes Technical Support Fundamentals, The Bits and Bites of Computer Networking, System Administration and IT Infrastructure Services, Operating Systems and You: Becoming a Power User, and IT Security: Defense Against the Digital Dark Arts.

-Recommendation-

Martinez Baker is a curious and hardworking devleoper. During my time as his instructor he made it his priority to ask deep questions to better understand the underlying mechanics of Javascript and the React Ecosystem. The obstacles he faced on his own projects did not extinguish his excitement, but instead fueled his passion for developing even further. I recommend Martinez to any team looking for a creative problem solver with a good foundation of Javascript and React.

-Brendan Roman, Nucamp Instructor
